thread.section_title: Eiffel Saint Charles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel!
thread.title_full: Great Hotel! - Review of Eiffel Saint Charles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Texastech1980
title: Great Hotel!
text: We booked this hotel through a 3rd party reservation, and was not disappointed! Great Front Desk Service, they kept your room key for you while you are gone. Helped find great places to eat, and helped any way you could need. The shower, Oh My God, the shower! The best hotel shower I have ever had. We let them know it was our honeymoon and they made sure we had a great experience! Short walk to two Metro Stops as well!
